name: Move Fever
description:
"Join the most crazy TV show ever!
Try to hit the wall shapes at the right time and earn fame and money!

- Unlock more than 12 unique characters!
- Dozens of different moves!
- Dispute for the world rankings!
- Breathtaking!


Thank you for playing Move Fever, your feedback is very important to improve the game constantly. So, if you face any issues or if you have new ideas for the game, please email us: support@mazarigames.com"
